original: Majjhima Nikāya 20
analyzed: majjhima nikāya

original: Vitakkasaṇṭhānasutta
analyzed: vitakka saṇṭhāna sutta

original: Evaṁ me sutaṁ—
analyzed: evam me suta

original: ekaṁ samayaṁ bhagavā sāvatthiyaṁ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
analyzed: ekam samayam bhagavā sāvatthiyam viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme

original: Tatra kho bhagavā bhikkhū āmantesi:
analyzed: tatra kho bhagavā bhikkhū āmantesi

original: “bhikkhavo”ti.
analyzed: bhikkhavaḥ ti

original: “Bhadante”ti te bhikkhū bhagavato paccassosuṁ.
analyzed: bhadanta iti te bhikkhū bhagavataḥ

original: Bhagavā etadavoca:
analyzed: bhagavān etat avoca

original: “Adhicittamanuyuttena, bhikkhave, bhikkhunā pañca nimittāni kālena kālaṁ manasi kātabbāni.
analyzed: adhicittam anuyuttena bhikkhave bhikkhunā pañca nimittāni kālena kālam manasi kātabbāni

original: Katamāni pañca?
analyzed: katamāni pañca

original: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno yaṁ nimittaṁ āgamma yaṁ nimittaṁ manasikaroto uppajjanti
analyzed: idha bhikkhave bhikkhunaḥ yam nimittam āgamma yam nimittam manasikarotaḥ uppajjanti

original: pāpakā akusalā vitakkā chandūpasaṁhitāpi dosūpasaṁhitāpi mohūpasaṁhitāpi, tena, bhikkhave,
analyzed: pāpakā akusalā vitakkā chanda upasahitā api dosa upasahitā api moha upasahitā api tena bhikkhave

original: bhikkhunā tamhā nimittā aññaṁ nimittaṁ manasi kātabbaṁ kusalūpasaṁhitaṁ.
analyzed: bhikkhunā tamhā nimittā aññam nimittam manasi kātabbam

original: Tassa tamhā nimittā aññaṁ nimittaṁ manasikaroto kusalūpasaṁhitaṁ ye pāpakā akusalā vitakkā chandūpasaṁhitāpi dosūpasaṁhitāpi mohūpasaṁhitāpi te pahīyanti te abbhatthaṁ gacchanti.
analyzed: tassa tamhā nimittā aññam nimittam manasikaroto kusala upasahitam ye pāpakāḥ akusalāḥ vitakkā chanda upasahitā api dosa upasahitā api moha upasahitā api te pahīyanti te abbhattham gacchanti

original: Tesaṁ pahānā ajjhattameva cittaṁ santiṭṭhati sannisīdati ekodi hoti samādhiyati.
analyzed: tesam pahānā ajjhattam eva cittam santiṭṭhati sannisīdati ekodi hoti samādhiyati

original: Seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, dakkho palagaṇḍo vā palagaṇḍantevāsī vā sukhumāya āṇiyā oḷārikaṁ āṇiṁ abhinihaneyya abhinīhareyya abhinivatteyya;
analyzed: seyyathā api bhikkhave dakkhaḥ palagaṇḍaḥ vā palagaṇḍa antevāsī vā sukhumāya āṇiyā oḷārikam āṇim abhinihaneyya abhinīhareyya abhinivatteyya

original: evameva kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno yaṁ nimittaṁ āgamma yaṁ nimittaṁ manasikaroto uppajjanti
analyzed: evam eva kho bhikkhave bhikkhunaḥ yam nimittam āgamma yam nimittam manasikarotaḥ uppajjanti

original: pāpakā akusalā vitakkā chandūpasaṁhitāpi dosūpasaṁhitāpi mohūpasaṁhitāpi, tena, bhikkhave,
analyzed: pāpakā akusalā vitakkā chanda upasahitā api dosa upasahitā api moha upasahitā api tena bhikkhave

original: bhikkhunā tamhā nimittā aññaṁ nimittaṁ manasi kātabbaṁ kusalūpasaṁhitaṁ.
analyzed: bhikkhunā tamhā nimittā aññam nimittam manasi kātabbam

original: Tassa tamhā nimittā aññaṁ nimittaṁ manasikaroto kusalūpasaṁhitaṁ ye pāpakā akusalā vitakkā chandūpasaṁhitāpi dosūpasaṁhitāpi mohūpasaṁhitāpi te pahīyanti te abbhatthaṁ gacchanti.
analyzed: tassa tamhā nimittā aññam nimittam manasikaroto kusala upasahitam ye pāpakāḥ akusalāḥ vitakkā chanda upasahitā api dosa upasahitā api moha upasahitā api te pahīyanti te abbhattham gacchanti

original: Tesaṁ pahānā ajjhattameva cittaṁ santiṭṭhati sannisīdati ekodi hoti samādhiyati.
analyzed: tesam pahānā ajjhattam eva cittam santiṭṭhati sannisīdati ekodi hoti samādhiyati

original: Tassa ce, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno tamhā nimittā aññaṁ nimittaṁ manasikaroto kusalūpasaṁhitaṁ
analyzed: tassa ce bhikkhave bhikkhuno tamhā nimittā aññam nimittam manasikaroto

original: uppajjanteva pāpakā akusalā vitakkā chandūpasaṁhitāpi dosūpasaṁhitāpi mohūpasaṁhitāpi,
analyzed: uppajjantā iva pāpakāḥ akusalāḥ vitakkā chanda upasahitā api dosa upasahitā api moha upasahitā api

original: tena, bhikkhave, bhikkhunā tesaṁ vitakkānaṁ ādīnavo upaparikkhitabbo:
analyzed: tena bhikkhave bhikkhunā tesam vitakkānam ādīnavaḥ upaparikkhitabbaḥ

original: ‘itipime vitakkā akusalā, itipime vitakkā sāvajjā, itipime vitakkā dukkhavipākā’ti.
analyzed: iti pi ime vitakkā akusalāḥ iti pi ime vitakkā sāvajjāḥ iti pi ime vitakkāḥ dukkha vipākā ati

original: Tassa tesaṁ vitakkānaṁ ādīnavaṁ upaparikkhato ye pāpakā akusalā vitakkā chandūpasaṁhitāpi dosūpasaṁhitāpi mohūpasaṁhitāpi te pahīyanti te abbhatthaṁ gacchanti.
analyzed: tassa tesam vitakkānam ādīnavam upaparikkhataḥ ye pāpakāḥ akusalāḥ vitakkā chanda upasahitāḥ api dosa upasahitāḥ api moha upasahitāḥ api te pahīyanti te abbhattham gacchanti

original: Tesaṁ pahānā ajjhattameva cittaṁ santiṭṭhati sannisīdati ekodi hoti samādhiyati.
analyzed: tesam pahānā ajjhattam eva cittam santiṭṭhati sannisīdati ekodi hoti samādhiyati

original: Seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, itthī vā puriso vā daharo yuvā maṇḍanakajātiko ahikuṇapena vā kukkurakuṇapena vā manussakuṇapena vā kaṇṭhe āsattena aṭṭiyeyya harāyeyya jiguccheyya;
analyzed: seyyathā api bhikkhave itthī vā purisaḥ vā daharaḥ yuvā maṇḍanaka jātikaḥ ahi kuṇapena vā kukkura kuṇapena vā manussa kuṇapena vā kaṇṭhe āsattena aṭṭiyeyya harāyeyya jiguccheyya

original: evameva kho, bhikkhave, tassa ce bhikkhuno tamhāpi nimittā aññaṁ nimittaṁ manasikaroto
analyzed: evam eva kho bhikkhave tassa ce bhikkhuno tamhā api nimittā aññam nimittam manasikaroto

original: kusalūpasaṁhitaṁ uppajjanteva pāpakā akusalā vitakkā chandūpasaṁhitāpi dosūpasaṁhitāpi
analyzed: kusala upasahitam uppajjantā iva pāpakāḥ akusalāḥ vitakkā chanda upasahitā api dosa upasahitā api

original: mohūpasaṁhitāpi, tena, bhikkhave, bhikkhunā tesaṁ vitakkānaṁ ādīnavo upaparikkhitabbo:
analyzed: moha upasahitā api tena bhikkhave bhikkhunā tesam vitakkānam ādīnavaḥ upaparikkhitabbaḥ

original: ‘itipime vitakkā akusalā, itipime vitakkā sāvajjā, itipime vitakkā dukkhavipākā’ti.
analyzed: iti pi ime vitakkā akusalāḥ iti pi ime vitakkā sāvajjāḥ iti pi ime vitakkāḥ dukkha vipākā ati

original: Tassa tesaṁ vitakkānaṁ ādīnavaṁ upaparikkhato ye pāpakā akusalā vitakkā chandūpasaṁhitāpi dosūpasaṁhitāpi mohūpasaṁhitāpi te pahīyanti te abbhatthaṁ gacchanti.
analyzed: tassa tesam vitakkānam ādīnavam upaparikkhataḥ ye pāpakāḥ akusalāḥ vitakkā chanda upasahitāḥ api dosa upasahitāḥ api moha upasahitāḥ api te pahīyanti te abbhattham gacchanti

original: Tesaṁ pahānā ajjhattameva cittaṁ santiṭṭhati sannisīdati ekodi hoti samādhiyati.
analyzed: tesam pahānā ajjhattam eva cittam santiṭṭhati sannisīdati ekodi hoti samādhiyati

original: Tassa ce, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno tesampi vitakkānaṁ ādīnavaṁ upaparikkhato uppajjanteva
analyzed: tassa ce bhikkhave bhikkhuno tesam pi vitakkānam ādīnavam upaparikkhato uppajjantā iva

original: pāpakā akusalā vitakkā chandūpasaṁhitāpi dosūpasaṁhitāpi mohūpasaṁhitāpi, tena, bhikkhave,
analyzed: pāpakā akusalā vitakkā chanda upasahitā api dosa upasahitā api moha upasahitā api tena bhikkhave

original: bhikkhunā tesaṁ vitakkānaṁ asatiamanasikāro āpajjitabbo.
analyzed: bhikkhunā tesam vitakkānam asati amanasikāraḥ āpajjitabbo

original: Tassa tesaṁ vitakkānaṁ asatiamanasikāraṁ āpajjato ye pāpakā akusalā vitakkā chandūpasaṁhitāpi dosūpasaṁhitāpi mohūpasaṁhitāpi te pahīyanti te abbhatthaṁ gacchanti.
analyzed: tassa tesam vitakkānam asati amanasikāram āpajjataḥ ye pāpakāḥ akusalāḥ vitakkā chanda upasahitā api dosa upasahitā api moha upasahitā api te pahīyanti te abbhattham gacchanti

original: Tesaṁ pahānā ajjhattameva cittaṁ santiṭṭhati sannisīdati ekodi hoti samādhiyati.
analyzed: tesam pahānā ajjhattam eva cittam santiṭṭhati sannisīdati ekodi hoti samādhiyati

original: Seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, cakkhumā puriso āpāthagatānaṁ rūpānaṁ adassanakāmo assa;
analyzed: seyyathā api bhikkhave cakkhumā purisaḥ āpātha gatānam rūpānam a dassana kāmaḥ assa

original: so nimīleyya vā aññena vā apalokeyya;
analyzed: saḥ nimīleyya vā aññena vā apalokeyya

original: evameva kho, bhikkhave, tassa ce bhikkhuno tesampi vitakkānaṁ ādīnavaṁ upaparikkhato
analyzed: evam eva kho bhikkhave tassa ce bhikkhunaḥ tesam pi vitakkānam ādīnavam upaparikkhataḥ

original: uppajjanteva pāpakā akusalā vitakkā chandūpasaṁhitāpi dosūpasaṁhitāpi mohūpasaṁhitāpi,
analyzed: uppajjantā iva pāpakāḥ akusalāḥ vitakkā chanda upasahitā api dosa upasahitā api moha upasahitā api

original: te pahīyanti te abbhatthaṁ gacchanti.
analyzed: te pahīyanti te abbhattham gacchanti

original: Tesaṁ pahānā ajjhattameva cittaṁ santiṭṭhati sannisīdati ekodi hoti samādhiyati.
analyzed: tesam pahānā ajjhattam eva cittam santiṭṭhati sannisīdati ekodi hoti samādhiyati

original: Tassa ce, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno tesampi vitakkānaṁ asatiamanasikāraṁ āpajjato uppajjanteva
analyzed: tassa ce bhikkhave bhikkhuno tesam pi vitakkānam asati amanasikāram āpajjataḥ uppajjantā iva

original: pāpakā akusalā vitakkā chandūpasaṁhitāpi dosūpasaṁhitāpi mohūpasaṁhitāpi, tena, bhikkhave,
analyzed: pāpakā akusalā vitakkā chanda upasahitā api dosa upasahitā api moha upasahitā api tena bhikkhave

original: bhikkhunā tesaṁ vitakkānaṁ vitakkasaṅkhārasaṇṭhānaṁ manasikātabbaṁ.
analyzed: bhikkhunā tesam vitakkānam vitakka saṅkhāra saṇṭhānam

original: Tassa tesaṁ vitakkānaṁ vitakkasaṅkhārasaṇṭhānaṁ manasikaroto ye pāpakā akusalā vitakkā chandūpasaṁhitāpi dosūpasaṁhitāpi mohūpasaṁhitāpi te pahīyanti te abbhatthaṁ gacchanti.
analyzed: tassa tesam vitakkānam vitakka saṅkhāra saṇṭhānam manasikarotaḥ ye pāpakāḥ akusalāḥ vitakkā chanda upasahitā api dosa upasahitā api moha upasahitā api te pahīyanti te abbhattham gacchanti

original: Tesaṁ pahānā ajjhattameva cittaṁ santiṭṭhati sannisīdati ekodi hoti samādhiyati.
analyzed: tesam pahānā ajjhattam eva cittam santiṭṭhati sannisīdati ekodi hoti samādhiyati

original: Seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, puriso sīghaṁ gaccheyya.
analyzed: seyyathā api bhikkhave purisaḥ sīgham gaccheyya

original: Tassa evamassa:
analyzed: tassa evamassa

original: ‘kiṁ nu kho ahaṁ sīghaṁ gacchāmi?
analyzed: kim nu khalu aham sīgham gacchāmi

original: Yannūnāhaṁ saṇikaṁ gaccheyyan’ti.
analyzed: yat nūna aham saṇikam gaccheyyanti

original: So saṇikaṁ gaccheyya.
analyzed: saḥ saṇikam gaccheyya

original: Tassa evamassa:
analyzed: tassa evamassa

original: ‘kiṁ nu kho ahaṁ saṇikaṁ gacchāmi?
analyzed: kim nu khalu aham saṇikam gacchāmi

original: Yannūnāhaṁ tiṭṭheyyan’ti.
analyzed: yat nūna aham tiṭṭheyyan ti

original: So tiṭṭheyya.
analyzed: saḥ tiṭṭheyya

original: Tassa evamassa:
analyzed: tassa evamassa

original: ‘kiṁ nu kho ahaṁ ṭhito?
analyzed: kim nu khalu aham ṭhitaḥ

original: Yannūnāhaṁ nisīdeyyan’ti.
analyzed: yat nūna aham nisīdeyyanti

original: So nisīdeyya.
analyzed: saḥ nisīdeyya

original: Tassa evamassa:
analyzed: tassa evamassa

original: ‘kiṁ nu kho ahaṁ nisinno?
analyzed: kim nu khalu aham nisinnaḥ

original: Yannūnāhaṁ nipajjeyyan’ti.
analyzed: yat nūna aham nipajjeyyanti

original: So nipajjeyya.
analyzed: saḥ nipajjeyya

original: Evañhi so, bhikkhave, puriso oḷārikaṁ oḷārikaṁ iriyāpathaṁ abhinivajjetvā sukhumaṁ sukhumaṁ iriyāpathaṁ kappeyya.
analyzed: evam hi saḥ bhikkhave purisaḥ oḷārikam oḷārikam iriyāpatham abhinivajjetvā sukhumam sukhumam iriyāpatham kappeyya

original: Evameva kho, bhikkhave, tassa ce bhikkhuno tesampi vitakkānaṁ asatiamanasikāraṁ āpajjato
analyzed: evam eva kho bhikkhave tassa ce bhikkhuno tesam pi vitakkānam asati amanasikāram āpajjataḥ

original: uppajjanteva pāpakā akusalā vitakkā chandūpasaṁhitāpi dosūpasaṁhitāpi mohūpasaṁhitāpi
analyzed: uppajjantā iva pāpakāḥ akusalāḥ vitakkā chanda upasahitā api dosa upasahitā api moha upasahitā api

original: te pahīyanti te abbhatthaṁ gacchanti.
analyzed: te pahīyanti te abbhattham gacchanti

original: Tesaṁ pahānā ajjhattameva cittaṁ santiṭṭhati sannisīdati ekodi hoti samādhiyati.
analyzed: tesam pahānā ajjhattam eva cittam santiṭṭhati sannisīdati ekodi hoti samādhiyati

original: Tassa ce, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno tesampi vitakkānaṁ vitakkasaṅkhārasaṇṭhānaṁ manasikaroto uppajjanteva pāpakā akusalā vitakkā chandūpasaṁhitāpi dosūpasaṁhitāpi mohūpasaṁhitāpi.
analyzed: tassa ce bhikkhave bhikkhuno tesam pi vitakkānam vitakka saṅkhāra saṇṭhānam manasikarotaḥ uppajjantā iva pāpakāḥ akusalāḥ vitakkā chanda upasahitā api dosa upasahitā api moha upasahitā api

original: Tena, bhikkhave, bhikkhunā dantebhidantamādhāya jivhāya tāluṁ āhacca cetasā cittaṁ abhiniggaṇhitabbaṁ abhinippīḷetabbaṁ abhisantāpetabbaṁ.
analyzed: tena bhikkhave bhikkhunā dantebhi dantam ādhāya jivhāya tālum āhacca cetasā cittam abhiniggaṇhitabbam abhinippīḍetabbam abhisantāpetabbam

original: Tassa dantebhidantamādhāya jivhāya tāluṁ āhacca cetasā cittaṁ abhiniggaṇhato abhinippīḷayato
analyzed: tassa dantebhiḥ dantam ādhāya jivhāya tālum āhat ca cetasā cittam abhiniggaṇhataḥ abhinippīḍayataḥ

original: abhisantāpayato ye pāpakā akusalā vitakkā chandūpasaṁhitāpi dosūpasaṁhitāpi mohūpasaṁhitāpi
analyzed: abhisantāpayataḥ ye pāpakāḥ akusalāḥ vitakkā chandū upasahitā api dosū upasahitā api mohu upasahitā api

original: te pahīyanti te abbhatthaṁ gacchanti.
analyzed: te pahīyanti te abbhattham gacchanti

original: Tesaṁ pahānā ajjhattameva cittaṁ santiṭṭhati sannisīdati ekodi hoti samādhiyati.
analyzed: tesam pahānā ajjhattam eva cittam santiṭṭhati sannisīdati ekodi hoti samādhiyati

original: Seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, balavā puriso dubbalataraṁ purisaṁ sīse vā gale vā khandhe vā gahetvā abhiniggaṇheyya abhinippīḷeyya abhisantāpeyya;

original: evameva kho, bhikkhave, tassa ce bhikkhuno tesampi vitakkānaṁ vitakkasaṅkhārasaṇṭhānaṁ

analyzed: manasikarotaḥ uppajjantā iva pāpakāḥ akusalāḥ vitakkā chanda upasahitā api dosa upasahitā api moha upasahitā api

original: Tena, bhikkhave, bhikkhunā dantebhidantamādhāya jivhāya tāluṁ āhacca cetasā cittaṁ abhiniggaṇhitabbaṁ abhinippīḷetabbaṁ abhisantāpetabbaṁ.

analyzed: tesam pahānā ajjhattam eva cittam santiṭṭhati sannisīdati ekodi hoti samādhiyati

analyzed: tesam pi vitakkānam ādīnavam upaparikkhataḥ ye pāpakāḥ akusalāḥ vitakkāḥ chanda upasahitāḥ api dosa upasahitāḥ api moha upasahitāḥ api te pahīyanti te abbhattham gacchanti

original: Tesaṁ pahānā ajjhattameva cittaṁ santiṭṭhati sannisīdati ekodi hoti samādhiyati.
analyzed: tesam pahānā ajjhattam eva cittam santiṭṭhati sannisīdati ekodi hoti samādhiyati

original: Tesampi vitakkānaṁ asatiamanasikāraṁ āpajjato ye pāpakā akusalā vitakkā chandūpasaṁhitāpi dosūpasaṁhitāpi mohūpasaṁhitāpi te pahīyanti te abbhatthaṁ gacchanti.
analyzed: tesam pi vitakkānam asati amanasikāram āpajjataḥ ye pāpakāḥ akusalāḥ vitakkā chanda upasahitā api dosa upasahitā api moha upasahitā api te pahīyanti te abbhattham gacchanti

original: Tesaṁ pahānā ajjhattameva cittaṁ santiṭṭhati sannisīdati ekodi hoti samādhiyati.
analyzed: tesam pahānā ajjhattam eva cittam santiṭṭhati sannisīdati ekodi hoti samādhiyati

original: Tesampi vitakkānaṁ vitakkasaṅkhārasaṇṭhānaṁ manasikaroto ye pāpakā akusalā vitakkā chandūpasaṁhitāpi dosūpasaṁhitāpi mohūpasaṁhitāpi te pahīyanti te abbhatthaṁ gacchanti.
analyzed: tesam pi vitakkānam vitakka saṅkhāra saṇṭhānam manasikarotaḥ ye pāpakāḥ akusalāḥ vitakkā chandu upasahitā api dosu upasahitā api mohu upasahitā api te pahīyanti te abbhattham gacchanti

original: Tesaṁ pahānā ajjhattameva cittaṁ santiṭṭhati sannisīdati ekodi hoti samādhiyati.
analyzed: tesam pahānā ajjhattam eva cittam santiṭṭhati sannisīdati ekodi hoti samādhiyati

original: Dantebhidantamādhāya jivhāya tāluṁ āhacca cetasā cittaṁ abhiniggaṇhato abhinippīḷayato
analyzed: dantebhiḥ dantam ādhāya jivhāya tālum ca cetasā cittam abhiniggaṇhataḥ abhinippīḍayataḥ

original: abhisantāpayato ye pāpakā akusalā vitakkā chandūpasaṁhitāpi dosūpasaṁhitāpi mohūpasaṁhitāpi
analyzed: abhisantāpayataḥ ye pāpakāḥ akusalāḥ vitakkā chandū upasahitā api dosū upasahitā api mohu upasahitā api

original: te pahīyanti te abbhatthaṁ gacchanti.
analyzed: te pahīyanti te abbhattham gacchanti

original: Tesaṁ pahānā ajjhattameva cittaṁ santiṭṭhati sannisīdati ekodi hoti samādhiyati.
analyzed: tesam pahānā ajjhattam eva cittam santiṭṭhati sannisīdati ekodi hoti samādhiyati

original: Ayaṁ vuccati, bhikkhave, bhikkhu vasī vitakkapariyāyapathesu.
analyzed: ayam vuccati bhikkhave bhikkhu vasī vitakka pariyāya pathesu

original: Yaṁ vitakkaṁ ākaṅkhissati taṁ vitakkaṁ vitakkessati, yaṁ vitakkaṁ nākaṅkhissati na taṁ vitakkaṁ vitakkessati.
analyzed: yam vitakkam ākaṅkhissati tam vitakkam vitakkessati yam vitakkam na ākaṅkhissati na tam vitakkam vitakkessati

original: Acchecchi taṇhaṁ, vivattayi saṁyojanaṁ, sammā mānābhisamayā antamakāsi dukkhassā”ti.
analyzed: dukkhassa ati

original: Idamavoca bhagavā.
analyzed: idam avoca bhagavān

original: Attamanā te bhikkhū bhagavato bhāsitaṁ abhinandunti.
analyzed: attamanāḥ te bhikkhū bhagavataḥ bhāsitam abhinandunti

original: Vitakkasaṇṭhānasuttaṁ niṭṭhitaṁ dasamaṁ.
analyzed: vitakkasaṇṭhāna suttam niṭṭhitam dasama

original: Sīhanādavaggo niṭṭhito dutiyo.
analyzed: sīhanāda vaggaḥ niṭṭhitaḥ dutiyaḥ

original: Tassuddānaṁ
analyzed: tassa uddāna

original: Cūḷasīhanādalomahaṁsavaro,
analyzed: cūḷa sīha nāda loma hasa varo

original: Mahācūḷadukkhakkhandhaanumānikasuttaṁ;
analyzed: mahācūḷa dukkhakkhandha anumānika sutta

original: Khilapatthamadhupiṇḍikadvidhāvitakka,
Pañcanimittakathā puna vaggo.
analyzed: pañca nimitta kathā puna vaggo
